title: Data Centers Are Asked to Bring Own Power Generation or Shut Down
author: Tsvetana Paraskova
intro: U.S. power grids are struggling with surging data center demand, forcing grid operators to require data centers to either provide their own power generation or agree to disconnect during peak demand periods to maintain grid reliability.
